ckusdcTopUp.title: Top Up ckUSDC Balance
ckusdcTopUp.subtitle: Follow these steps to convert USDC to ckUSDC
ckusdcTopUp.step1Desc: Navigate to the Wallet page using the navigation menu at the bottom of the screen.
ckusdcTopUp.step2Desc: On the Wallet page, locate and click on the "Swap" tab to access the conversion interface.
ckusdcTopUp.step3Desc: You'll need ETH for gas fees and USDC on Ethereum. Transfer them to your EasySwap wallet address shown on the Swap tab.
ckusdcTopUp.step4Desc: Follow the swap interface instructions to convert your USDC to ckUSDC. This uses ICP's decentralized exchange process.
ckusdcTopUp.step5Desc: Once converted, you can use ckUSDC to submit BSV top-up requests, become a trader, or withdraw to your Metanet balance.
ckusdcTopUp.step6Desc: You can convert ckUSDC back to USDC on Ethereum anytime using the Swap tab. Simply swap ckUSDC â†’ ETH USDC and provide ANY Ethereum address you want - your EasySwap address, a centralized exchange, or any other wallet.
ckusdcTopUp.infoNote: ckUSDC is a chain-key USDC token on ICP that enables decentralized swaps and seamless integration with EasySwap's fully autonomous BSV Top-up Orderbook.
